title: Deep learning model predicts protein folding from sequence alone
one_liner: A new transformer model achieves state-of-the-art accuracy on protein structure prediction.
analysis: CORE CLAIM: New model achieves SOTA on protein folding. METHOD: Transformer trained on 500M sequences. RESULTS: 2.1 Angstrom RMSD improvement. WHY IT MATTERS: Faster and cheaper than AlphaFold.

title: Antibody engineering using directed evolution
one_liner: Researchers used directed evolution to improve antibody binding by 100-fold.

title: Enzyme design for sustainable chemistry
one_liner: De novo enzyme design enables green synthesis of pharmaceuticals.
